responses: Hello! I'm BCET Chatbot. How can I help you today?
Hi there! Ask me anything about BCET.
Bengal College of Engineering and Technology (BCET), Durgapur was established in 2001. It is approved by AICTE, affiliated to MAKAUT, and accredited by NAAC.
BCET is located at DA-6, Sector-III, Bidhannagar, Durgapur – 713212, West Bengal.
BCET offers B.Tech (CSE, ECE, EE, ME, CE, IT, EEE), BBA, BCA, MBA, MCA, B.Pharm, and Nursing programs.
B.Tech fee: approx ₹4-4.8 Lakh total. MBA: ₹2.6 Lakh. Hostel charges: ₹56,000 to ₹70,000 per semester.
BCET has 85-90% placement. Top recruiters: TCS, Wipro, Capgemini, Amazon. Avg. package: ₹3.5-4 LPA. Highest: ₹10 LPA.
BCET hosts Exotica (Cultural fest), Techtronix (Technical fest), Annual Day, and Sports Meet.
BCET has separate boys and girls hostels with mess, Wi-Fi, gym and reading rooms. Fees range from ₹56,000 to ₹70,000 per semester.
Yes. SVMCM, SC/ST/OBC, Kanyashree, and merit-based scholarships are available for eligible students.
Admission in B.Tech is through WBJEE or JEE Main. MBA through MAT/JEMAT. Management quota is also available.
Goodbye! Feel free to ask me anything about BCET anytime.
